title: Home
text:
Hello!
Welcome to my website! My name is Marissa Gill and I am a second-year student at the University of California, Santa Barbara. I am currently pursuing degrees in both Hydrologic Science and Policy, and Geography with an Emphasis in Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

title: About
text: This page will include an about me with my interests, hobbies, extracurriculars, and skills.

title: Resume
text: This page will feature my resume, including academic achievements and work/relevant experience.

title: Why Water?
text: This page will include a memo about how I gained interest in my majors/ career paths, and how I am applying what I am learning in the classroom to the broader fields of geography and hydrology.

title: Projects
text:
This page will highlight signifcant projects I have completed throughout my education in different classes.
